website_summaries.verdict: Highly precise, this dispenser will pour 1/2" of sugar upon command. Cleanup is just as easy.
pros: We love the sugar controls in place in this dispenser
Whether controlling calories or specific health concerns, this product is designed to aid with precise measurements
cons: This dispenser is primarily designed for small, accurate proportions

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and keeps us from getting the diabeetus by measuring our dose of sugary goodness
customer_reviews.author: JetFx Purchasing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect gadget! I love the size. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: romelia gutierrez becker

customer_reviews.title: Great dispenser
customer_reviews.text: The sugar dispenser is very nice product. It works well and holds a good amount of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Farah Moheban

customer_reviews.title: Perfect measure every time
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad this sugar dispenser caught my eye. This is a nice item, it is well constructed and pours well. I really like how I can pour the perfect measure every time. It also looks nice on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Orna

customer_reviews.title: We love that you never have to dip the spoon in ...
customer_reviews.text: We love that you never have to dip the spoon in the sugar bowl and it always give the proper amount every time.
customer_reviews.author: C Castle

customer_reviews.title: Where have I been?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what took me so long to purchase one of these, I love everything about it. I thought it would be a little taller,, but the measurements are correct. It is easy to grab and pour, easy to store and it goes in the dishwasher! I'm a dork and put the plastic measuring insert backwards in the lid the first time, but it does measure the amount correctly. Perfect for kids because there's no mess all over the counter and it can be measured in 1/2 teaspoon increments.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie R.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but very cheap feeling.
customer_reviews.text: Pros It works. It lets you measure easily. Cons The black plastic decorative "wave" ring immediately fell off on mine. It looks like it was glued on with like 2 spots of glue. Easy to repair, but a huge pain. The flippy lid cap doesn't really flip well in either direction. I have to open and close it by hand. The whole cap assembly feels super cheap. The bottle is glass so that part is ok. I would rather have paid a few bucks more for something less junky, or stuck with a jar and a cheap measuring spoon kept inside.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan K.

customer_reviews.title: It's a challenge to get any sugar out of this dispenser
customer_reviews.text: The sugar dispenser looks nice, but it's really hard to use it. I filled it with sugar and turned upside down to get some - but no luck. I need to shake it first, than turn upside down, sometimes I need to help the cover open, and then I'm lucky or not to get any sugar out of it. I sent an email to their support with questions (who knows maybe there is special way to use it), but received an answer that I can return (modify) my order through Amazon. It was definitely not helpful and not what I asked.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what I expected it to be. The minute I placed sugar in the container and twisted it shut the black trim on the outside broke off. I reopened it because the sugar was not pouring out the way it was suppose to and as I twisted off the inside contraption that dispensed the sugar that cracked and broke.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Nuciforo

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Light plastic feel. Not exactly what I was expecting. I suppose pouring out a smaller amount of sugar (half teaspoon) is better than a full teaspoon in case you wanted 1.5 or 2.5 teaspoons rather than 2 or 3 tsp. However, if you want 2-3 tsp you have to invert this shaker 4-6 times to get that amount. Since that is what I want, this is more of a hassle than it is a solution for me. It works like it should, but I find it painstakingly slow to get what I want. I bought it to save space on the countertop for morning coffee before work, and it does manage that well, but it just takes Too Long.
customer_reviews.author: the alchemist

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few months[, then got a warranty replacement].
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months the measuring piece falls off the lid. As a plain sugar pourer, it’s overrated. *EDIT* Vendor did warranty the unit and shipped a replacement after having to call them (they did not want to handle it over email). Hope my experience is a one-off. Adding a star, would add a half star too if I could.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Good company to deal with, they back up their products
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with the idea of this sugar dispenser, and could not wait for it to arrive. It turns out that I cannot use it as planned. It is well made and attractive on the kitchen counter. UPDATE... In response to my note above, I received an email from the makers of this sugar dispenser, asking me to call them, which I did. They not only responded to see if they could be of help, but they offered a full refund. This tells me that they are an honest company who is trying to produce a good product. Therefore I have raised them to the five star level.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Clogs up easily
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product because the sugar would get trapped in the inside scoop which controls each pour. The insides were dry. The sugar was not wet nor do we live in a humid environment. Just didnt work for me. I was disappointed because I love the look of this container.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Scheunemann

customer_reviews.title: The measuring portion is useless. Not consistent and you need to tip the ...
customer_reviews.text: The measuring portion is useless. Not consistent and you need to tip the jar multiple times to refill the little measuring cup. It sort of works if it is very full. I wanted it to work really bad, at my husbands insistence I gave up after a week and took the measuring device out. I was hoping that would cure the second problem I had with it (it didn't), which is that the little black lid does not open to pour the sugar out. It gets stuck shut and you have to open it with your finger, even when completely upside down! Going back to a spoon, which sadly is easier than this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie McKain

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Already threw this product in the garbage, it’s ridiculous to fill the teaspoon area constantly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, great for portion control
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have been using way too much sugar in my coffee and wanted to control how much sugar I use. This came quickly and seems to be well made. I checked to make sure the dispenser does pour out only half a teaspoon each time, and it does. I really like this and would recommend it to anyone trying to control their sugar intake.
customer_reviews.author: Noneya

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work great.
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I don't like the measurements because I use about 3-4 teaspoons of sugar in my coffee (I know it's a lot, but coffee is bitter!) so I have to pour 8 times. It doesn't seem to work well. The sugar doesn't go into the measuring cup easily every time. I tried just taking the cup out and it doesn't work right that way.
customer_reviews.author: joceldust

customer_reviews.title: Free-flow impossible.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a detachable 1/2 teaspoon cup on inside of lid - downside of this piece is you have to work to get the sugar inside of it (flip the bottle upside down, to the side.. so on so forth). With this 1/2 tsp measuring piece attached, you can not free-flow, as any sugar inside the piece will come out at once. Easy fix I thought - remove the measuring cup from the inside of the dispenser. Problem with this is I wasn’t happy with the lid to the dispenser, you basically have to hold the dispenser upside down in order for it to open up and allow sugar to flow.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Rusted and plastic cover will not stay on. It’s in the trash already.
customer_reviews.author: John D McCloskey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but smaller than thought and sugar turns hard next day.
customer_reviews.text: I think it's beautiful although smaller than what I thought. My sugar however the next day was already clumping up. So may be good if you have visitors coming over and you want to fill it for coffee or teas. But I don't think it is good for everday use.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Works as described. Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item. Works exactly as described. Helps me keep track and keeps you from spilling too much.
customer_reviews.author: Brian N. Kosich

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: This was a terrible product, I would not recommend this to anyone. The design was not well thought out. You could not get the sugar or creamer out, it would get stuck. Sorry I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Campbell Stowers

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the product and with the speed at which it was delivered. If you wish to have free flow on your sugar instead of 1/2 teaspoon measurements it is really easy to detach the measuring device on the underside of the lid. The sugar shaker is very stylish looking and I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Ike

customer_reviews.title: Just ok so not using this product anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this to measure out my sugar. But it’s bulky and I don’t know why I really never got the hang of the pouring. I gave up and don’t use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. I broke too many sugar bowls so I decided to get this one. Like the fact that the amount that pours out are measured. This makes it easy when I cook or bake.
customer_reviews.author: Ayisha Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn't seal.
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and a nice concept but unfortunately the top flap doesn't seal allowing small sugar ants in which i was disappointed with. Also because air gets in it allows moisture from humidity in which clumps the sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hall

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Threw the trash. Did not feel like returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A Larkins

customer_reviews.title: Works with sucralose sweeteners
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and look of this dispenser. I use sucralose sweetener and it is powdery, so you may have to tap the bottom to get the measured amount, but I'm happy with it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy K.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this... you need it lol
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! It’s so cute and accurate. Now I don’t have to clean up sugar all over the counter when my boyfriend makes his coffee lol :-) Sweet sweet victory. If you’re thinking about buying this, just to do it Lol
customer_reviews.author: ZJayye

customer_reviews.title: Functions well - Arrived on time!
customer_reviews.text: This measured sugar shaker may not dispense exactly a 1/2 teaspoon, but it seems to consistently pour something darn close to a 1/2 tsp! Looks good, and was delivered on time and intact.
customer_reviews.author: Littleton's RT

customer_reviews.title: Simple clean looking dispenser that works for
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this with brown raw sugar and it doesn’t work with portioning out the serving. I did remove the portion separator and use it as a regular sugar dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shue

customer_reviews.title: Good but has issues
customer_reviews.text: Good product but has some issues. The flap on the top sticks closed not letting anything come out. Also I drilled holes in the bottom of the lid to let more sugar come out. After the modifications it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Controlled portions
customer_reviews.text: The pouring mechanism made using this tricky. I’m not sure if it was meant to portion the sugar in small increments, but we like to pour and simply do our own controlling of portions. After we “modified” the design, it pours continuously.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my use
customer_reviews.text: The container is smaller than anticipated. The internal plastic measuring device was broken so it wouldn't fit. Don't think I would have used it anyway. I have to refill it every other day. Would be much better is twice the size.
customer_reviews.author: 94Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Neat dispenser. Beware moisture buildup.
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat sugar dispenser. I like the measured 1/2 teaspoon per pour. The biggest problem with it is that the dispenser doesn’t handle moisture well. There are plenty of tight areas where sugar gets clumped up and you don’t get the measured amount out. I’m thinking about storing it in a bag or jar with some dessicants.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Practical Kitchen Storage
customer_reviews.text: Great for sugar storage and measurements if needed for baking. This product is still susceptible to humidity if used for sugar storage.
customer_reviews.author: cedoubleu

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have two of them. Pouring is a great alternative and I love the flap covers. I removed the measuring thingy... makes it easier to pour. Flap cover seems a bit flimsy but has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camera Camper

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s functional and it looks good. It helps reduce the amount of sugar I put in coffee and tea. Pouring from a standard container you get a different amount each time or you have to use a spoon to measure, which isn’t convenient, especially in an office setting.
customer_reviews.author: MsTiffanyChanel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grip.
customer_reviews.text: I gave only 4 because I haven't actually used it for dispensing yet. I washed it and put it away. I'm sure it will be easy to hold and pour, and love the ergonomic design of the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Helper
customer_reviews.text: Since I am the only one in the house who uses sugar in their coffee, It was great and the amount is measured for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Removed the pre.meaairing device bc I didn't like it ... But other than that I loved it
customer_reviews.author: S deblois

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design
customer_reviews.text: Poor design. Sugar simply wouldn't flow from the nozzle. If you pour over hot coffee, steam will make the nozzle clog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to pour sugar. I will not use it.
customer_reviews.author: karen zollo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great for sugar, but if you are a Stevia user this works best when fuller.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly like stated.
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as advertised. We did take the 1/2 tp measure off. It was just better for our needs without. Product is easy to use, and easy to clean. Exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too small
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this bottle to keep my counter looking nice, there is only 2 people in the hose. This bottle is too small, I have to keep refilling every week. I wish it held more.
customer_reviews.author: melissa herrera

customer_reviews.title: Consistent sugar dispenser
customer_reviews.text: We keep this on our coffee bar. Easy to fill, no mess ever, consistent sugar with every tip of the shaker.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Allen

customer_reviews.title: Fair product
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to get the correct amount out of the dispenser on the first try
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: It’s a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and keeps you honest on how much you are using. Requires shaking a bit to have it dispense as it should but that is perfectly ok!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hart

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, expensive for size
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work well at all....sugar gets stuck in part that's supposed to measure out and it's impossible to clean inside that section so long term sanitation is impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for sugar
customer_reviews.text: Good for sugar made of glass but the lid is plastic so the lid needs to be used gently when washing
customer_reviews.author: Ethel

customer_reviews.title: not suitable for subtropical climate
customer_reviews.text: sugar not coming diwn easily as funnel gets easily clogged partially blocking flow not suitable for climate conditions in florida as humidity is ever present even with full time air conditioning
customer_reviews.author: sandro p.

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok
customer_reviews.text: The sugar gets stuck in top so it won't dispense. you have to use something small to clear it. It's a little small but I knew that.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and nice look. I like that you can remove the measuring cup from it to make it pour only.
customer_reviews.author: Honey child

customer_reviews.title: No spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love it no more spoons in my sugar just pour and go
customer_reviews.author: andrea jones

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as Tupperware, but prettier
customer_reviews.text: It does what it should - pour sugar or portion it, depending on need. I think this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: JLPAL

customer_reviews.title: Convienent and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I no longer have to pour directly from the bag and you can see through it so you know when it’s time to refill. Also has measured pours so you don’t over do it.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance M.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Functional! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sugar dispenser! So easy to use and it looks great! Works perfectly and Easy to Clean and refill!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The Sugar doesn't come out due to the pre-measure feature. Have had guests attempt to use and confused why no suger or too much comes out. I was looking for a simple sugar dispenser. The pre-measure feature is useless and a hassle. It does has a nice appearance and size.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie F. Colano

customer_reviews.title: Its useless but if and i wish I didn’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: This thing it’s useless it barely dropes not even a half spoon like it says and its not easy to use !
customer_reviews.author: Fatme

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Hard to clean the plastic piece inside. Dribbles out. All in all not wortho $17 with tax.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and dispenses the right amount for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice design!. decent quality and its lightly dispenses the creamer not a torrent like others
customer_reviews.author: The Empress

customer_reviews.title: Restricted
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about 1/2 teaspoon measurement. Too small. It would a better product if it had a way to change amount or get rid of measurement. The top piece is plastic. Not a fan of plastic parts. Will break easily Will do for now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In 99¢ Store will be better than this one.
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when I got it. Quality is bad. the lid is stuck and sugar does not strew out.
customer_reviews.author: margo

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the measuring feature. Perfect size and perfect design love love
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this dispenser I can leave it on the kitchen counter and it looks and stays clean
customer_reviews.author: WMW

customer_reviews.title: Returning it
customer_reviews.text: Have to turn it over 4 time to get a full tea spoon. Obviously was checked out to do what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: A 1/2 tsp of sugar is less than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Great if you’re measuring your sugar intake. Annoying, if you’re not. Fortunately, the measuring insert is removable.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Burnett

customer_reviews.title: It's just the right size and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my counter and it so easy to use. No more grains of all over the counter while pouring. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: You'll need to refill constantly.
customer_reviews.text: I had Hope's for this, but it us very tiny and in order to get the sugar to come out, you constantly have to spin it to get sugar into the measured part. Great concept, but poor execution.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to get sugar in your coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sugar dispenser. The best we have ever had. Easily pours the right amount of sugar in your coffee. Very convenient when you are in a rush to go to work in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Alicante

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work! We love it! Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've wanted to test the precision but wtf it's good enough I'm happy and use everyday
customer_reviews.text: It works. I've wanted to test the precision but wtf it's good enough I'm happy and use everyday. With brown sugar no less
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Shuman

customer_reviews.title: REMOVE THE INTERNAL MEASURING DEVICE
customer_reviews.text: Removed the internal volume measures device. Now it works to my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: "Edward Z" in Maryland!

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Clever Container
customer_reviews.text: I love that this container is glass. It is a quality item that will last a long time. The 1/2 teaspoon pour feature is brilliant to control your intake of sugar. After trying several different products this is the winner hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and helps me know exactly how much sugar is added to my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: vigrid

customer_reviews.title: Works well for sugar and creamer.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought 2 Pour and Measure for my husband for in our camper. He likes that it measures the sugar, but took the measure spout out for the creamer. He is very happy with the purchase. I will be ordering 2 more for home.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: 5 star review!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little sugar dispenser. It is an simple and convenient way of making sure you dont over sweeten your drinks . Its also makes a nice presentation
customer_reviews.author: Justin Oberman

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to pour out
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to pour sugar out from. We haven’t used it since we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Withley

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars. Clogs easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my coffee bar but it clumps very easily and becomes hard to pour sugar. Not very easy to clean. Arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sugar dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice, was disappointed the "lid/spout" is just plastic but looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: jmy

customer_reviews.title: Fine tuning for sugar consumption
customer_reviews.text: It gives small amount of sugar for every dumps that lets you tune/aware/monitor your sugar consumption. It is going to be nice item who has sugar related healt concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Senol Erdogan

customer_reviews.title: Small and tedious
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute container however it doesn't hold much for 3 person coffee drinking family. To refill is torturous and pouring is annoying at times. I did not like this purchase but I hate going back to sugar bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Better for some people than others
customer_reviews.text: I liked this well-enough, but hubby thought it was a pain how little came out at a time...
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Too much trouble
customer_reviews.text: Not working like I thought it would, clogs have to shake to get any sugar out, too much trouble, went back to sugar bowl with simple spoon just regret missing window to return!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product is effective and works as advertised. Be aware that it is not adjustable and only measures out 1/2 teaspoon at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: I did not use the measuring tool. The sugar bowl however works great and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE BYERS

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dispense the sugar
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. Sugar is difficult to get out. Doesn’t pour well
customer_reviews.author: Margaret taliercio

customer_reviews.title: Measure everything!
customer_reviews.text: I use this container to dispense Swerve granular, as this is an expensive sweetener and alittle goes a long way...2 pours and i know i have a teaspoon exactly. Love it
customer_reviews.author: CMe Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't pour consistently.
customer_reviews.text: Stops pouring after the first time perhaps due to moisture from hot tea/coffee stream. Had to leave open many times to allow sugar to dry. Still ended up having to use a spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Mingo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really like this item. It is glass which I didnt expect and I love it. Sturdy, serves the exact amount of sugar. Worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: joni c.

customer_reviews.title: P.O.S.
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when it arrived. Good idea, but poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Holds sugar, but is otherwise not functional
customer_reviews.text: Sugar doesn’t poor easily from this. It crystallizes even in dry environments and the measured is not functional.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. I use this for Splenda Easier use for husband
customer_reviews.author: Sharon J

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This sugar dispenser is perfect for people who like an exact measure of sugar in their beverages or anything else, very comfortable item.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Suliman-Zada

customer_reviews.title: it does not disperse 1/2 tablespoon. Much less thus you have to keep on flipping it back and forth.
customer_reviews.text: It also steams up when you go to put it in your coffee or tea then sugar sticks together.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Its very nice for measuring out Sugar as it doesn't just all spill out in a continuous motion.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it ..I have 2, and they are gret, specially with my son that he can not seem to know when to stop pouring sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Tila

customer_reviews.title: Great for children.
customer_reviews.text: Measures out a half teaspoon each time. Smaller than expected but durable and easy to use. Cleans up quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Never use a spoon again 😃👌🥰
customer_reviews.text: I love it it does the 1 teaspoon measurement for you 😃 I use it for my Powder Trivia sugar
customer_reviews.author: Mappy Champin-Leugoud

product_meta.title: Gourmia GSS9995 POUR -N- MEASURE Sugar Dispenser and Container without Pouring Spout - Select Half Teaspoon Per Pour or Free Flow - Clear Glass Jar - 7.5oz - BPA Free - Dishwasher Safe,White
product_meta.description:
Getting the right amount of sugar into your morning coffee can make the difference between starting your day on the right foot and making your Monday feel like a drag. That evening tea that you enjoy after a long day at work always needs to have just the right amount of sweetness of you might find yourself not sleeping well. With Gourmia, trivial issues like these are a thing of the past. The Automatic Sugar Dispenser is here to sweeten up your life in just the right way!

Product Features

 1/2 Teaspoon of Sugar with Each Pour
Clear, Glass Body with BPA Free Plastic Spout
7.5 Ounce Capacity
Great for Coffee, Tea, Cereals, Desserts, and More!
Adjustable to Freely Pour Any Amounts of Sugar
Easy Refill
Dishwasher Safe for Easy Maintenance

A NECESSARY PART OF YOUR MORNING AND EVENING

When it's time to get the day going or you want to sit back and relax, a perfectly sweetened hot cup of your favorite beverage makes it all the better. With our Automatic Sugar Dispenser you'll know you're getting just the right amount of sugar each time with the super convenient pouring mechanism that dispenses exactly half of a teaspoon each time - completely mess-free! So whether you're looking for a lightly sugared or super sweet cup of coffee, you can always get exactly what you want with simplicity.

ELEGANT DESIGN
